buildCommand.academy-ui: cd shared/web-core && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../../academy-ui && yarn install && prisma generate && next build

buildCommand.defi-alerts: cd shared/web-core && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../../defi-alerts && yarn install && prisma generate && next build
buildCommand.insights-ui: cd shared/web-core && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../../insights-ui && yarn install && prisma generate && next build
